## DescribeSegment type

A structured segment of a matcher description. Instead of returning a flat string, `describe` functions return a tree of these segments, which can be rendered into a flat string (for use as a lookup key) or pretty-printed with indentation for nested structures.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type DescribeSegment = {
    readonly kind: 'message';
    readonly message: string;
} | {
    readonly kind: 'object';
    readonly entries: ReadonlyArray<{
        readonly key: string;
        readonly value: DescribeSegment;
    }>;
} | {
    readonly kind: 'array';
    readonly elements: ReadonlyArray<DescribeSegment>;
} | {
    readonly kind: 'concat';
    readonly segments: ReadonlyArray<DescribeSegment>;
} | {
    readonly kind: 'join';
    readonly separator: string;
    readonly segments: ReadonlyArray<DescribeSegment>;
};
```
**References:** [DescribeSegment](./case-plugin-base.describesegment.md)
